transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello, aawaj aa rahi hai sir?

Executive: Haan, sir karein start. Hello.

Customer: Haan sir aawaj aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji aa rahi hai, bole. Haan, mai ye bol raha tha sir ki jo domain hai na, ye IndiaMART ke dwara aapko mila tha, thik hai? 
Customer: Haan haan. Okay, iska access aapko mil jayega.
Executive: Jo sir domain aap bata rahe ho omegadouble.in
Customer: Haan. Sir ye jo domain aapne purchase kar liya hai?
Executive: Nahi, abhi tak kiya nahi hai.
Executive: Sir ye available hai abhi, mai check kar raha tha. To ye domain abhi available hai. Kindly usko purchase kar lo.
Customer: Wo hum log, wo hum, haan. Sir jaise hi aap purchase kar loge,
Executive: Uska access aapko simply mail through karna hoga. Mai mail ID apna bata deta hu.
Customer: Thik hai. Through mail aapka ye, haan bataiye. Chalo thik hai, ye .in .in ka mai aapko samajh ke batata hu. Ya to hum hi purchase karke aapko provide kar denge ya fir agar hua to aap hi ko bol dunga ki aap hi wo cheez kar lijiye.
Executive: Okay, okay, got it, got your point. Thik hai, mai ek baar iske liye bhi discuss karunga. Basically aap bhi purchase kar sakte ho.
Customer: Ek baar aap please jo price dikha raha hai, wo dikha raha hai. Aapki aawaj, aapki aawaj actually bahut kat rahi hai.
Executive: Sorry, ek second, ab nahi kategi. To sir iska jo price dikha raha hai na, wo dikha raha hai 599.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Mai abhi dekh raha tha price.
Executive: Protection wotection on kar diya jaye to. Kis, aap kis pe dekh rahe hai, godaddy.com?
Customer: Godaddy. Godaddy.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: To ek baar agar aap humein se mai wo provide karwa do, to simply mail karna hoga aur kuch nahi karna hoga. Mail ID pe ek baar mere ko ye ki ye domain ka ye hai, password ye hai. Fir hum access karke aapka domain register kar denge, same aapke jo website hai usse link kar denge.
Customer: Thik hai. In another case hoga ye ki hum fir aapke liye wo cheez mai ek baar confirm kar leta hu.
Customer: Thik hai na? Haan, wo mai bhi, mai bhi aapko, mai bhi aapko thoda sa matlab baat karke confirm karke batata hu.
Customer: Haan. Ki kaisa possible rahega humare end se bhi. Agar hua to hum log ye de denge, nahi to fir aapko bolna padega.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai. Mai bhi ek baar charge ki baat kar leta hu ki kya is charges hai uske, thik hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. Thik hai, thank you sir. Okay, alright.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with domain purchase.

- Wants to know about the charges.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the domain purchase process.

- Offered to assist with the purchase.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm the domain purchase process.

- Customer will check the charges.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, purchase, charges, website
